Plots an objects_rgb object Produces an histogram of an objects_rgb object @name objects_rgb

plot.objects_rgb.Rd

Plots an objects_rgb object Produces an histogram of an objects_rgb object @name objects_rgb

# S3 method for objects_rgb
plot(x, ...)

Arguments

x

An object of class objects_rgb.
...

Currently not used

Value

A ggplot object containing the distribution of the pixels for each index.

Author

Tiago Olivoto tiagoolivoto@gmail.com

Examples

# \donttest{
library(pliman)

img <- image_import(image_pliman("soy_green.jpg"))
# Segment the foreground (grains) using the normalized blue index
# Shows the average value of the blue index in each object
rgb <- objects_rgb(img)

plot(rgb)

# }
